titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York 121st anniversary banquet program ARC.262
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:15:34 +0000.

did.unittitle: Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York 121st anniversary banquet program

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Society of the Friendly Sons of Saint Patrick in the City of New York

physdesc.extent: in one folder in one oversize box.

did.abstract: Program from the 121st anniversary banquet of the Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York, dating from 1905.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York 121st anniversary banquet program, ARC.262, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York was founded in 1784 as a charitable and social organization for Irish Americans residing in New York City.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Program from the 121st anniversary banquet of the Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York, dating from 1905.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown.
